body: Use {@code ... } instead of .... Or better still, since this is a private method and thus won't appear in Javadocs can do away with any annotations, which will make it easier to read in code. .e.g, "handle to the C TF_Graph object and ..."
body_html:
Use {@code ... } instead of ....

Or better still, since this is a private method and thus won't appear in Javadocs can do away with any annotations, which will make it easier to read in code.

.e.g, "handle to the C TF_Graph object and ..."
